channel.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India
channel.description: World News: TOI brings the latest world news headlines, Current International breaking news world wide. In depth analysis and top news headlines world wide.

image.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India

item.title: Photo of Kamala Harris’ great-niece Amara watching historic moment at DNC breaks the internet: 'THIS is the picture that goes into history books'
item.description: A stirring photograph of Kamala Harris’ great-niece, Amara Ajagu, intently watching her aunt accept the Democratic nomination, has gone viral. Captured by Todd Heisler, the image has been lauded for its emotional resonance and met with mixed reactions online. Amara, already expressing strong social values, adds a personal touch to Harris' campaign.

item.title: Neither Beyonce nor Taylor Swift, this was the 'special guest' at end of DNC
item.description: The Democratic National Convention ended amid much anticipation for rumored performances by pop icons like Beyonce and Taylor Swift. Although artists like Pink and John Legend did perform, Beyonce and Swift did not make surprise appearances. Kamala Harris' speech highlighted the event, with organizers stating no celebrity performances were planned to maintain electoral focus.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Tim Walz under fire after viral video captures him aggressively pulling son Gus on DNC stage: 'Shows his true colors'
item.description: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz faced mixed reactions after a video showed him pulling his son Gus onto the stage at the Democratic National Convention. Initially praised for their emotional display, the gesture is now seen by some as aggressive. The controversy comes during a crucial time for Walz's campaign with Kamala Harris.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: JD Vance walks into donut shop and no one cares, VP candidate roasted over 'awkward' and 'cringe-worthy' moment: Watch
item.description: During a campaign stop at Holt's Sweet Shop in Valdosta, Georgia, vice presidential candidate JD Vance faced an awkward situation when an employee requested not to be filmed. The cringe-worthy encounter went viral on social media. Vance, whose attempts at casual interaction fell flat, later addressed local issues and criticized the Democrats’ immigration policies during his rally.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Tyrants are laughing at her': What Donald Trump said about Kamala Harris' DNC speech
item.description: Donald Trump criticized Kamala Harris's speech at the Democratic National Convention, where she accepted the Democratic presidential nomination. Harris discussed her stance on Ukraine, NATO, and immigration. Trump condemned her viewpoints and actions on these issues, labeling her a radical and accusing her of failing on border security and international relations.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Tourists trample Angkor Wat mimicking Temple Run game for TikTok hits
item.description: Visitors are replicating the Temple Run video game at Cambodia’s Angkor Wat, sparking concerns among conservationists about potential damage to the 900-year-old site. The trend has gained significant online traction, but experts stress the importance of balancing tourism, sustainability, and cultural respect. Discussions are ongoing about how best to manage and preserve historic site.

item.title: Kamala Harris tears into Trump at DNC speech: 'Unserious man, but consequences of his return to White House extremely serious'
item.description: Kamala Harris accepted the Democratic nomination for president, using her speech at the convention to criticize Donald Trump and outline her vision for the future. She highlighted the dangers of a Trump re-election, citing his attempts to overturn the 2020 results and legal troubles. Harris promised to prioritize unity and core American values, energizing the audience for the upcoming election.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Kamala Harris formally accepts Democratic nomination: 'A president for all Americans'
item.description: Kamala Harris took the stage at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago to accept the party’s 2024 presidential nomination. She stressed unity and inclusivity in her campaign against Donald Trump. Harris’s nomination, following Joe Biden’s withdrawal, positions her to be the first woman elected President of the United States.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Tim Walz and family dance to Springsteen’s ‘Born In The USA’ at DNC
item.description: Democratic vice presidential nominee Tim Walz danced to Bruce Springsteen's 'Born In The USA' with his children at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago. The cheerful moment, which contrasted with the convention's serious tone, was significant for the Walz family and garnered attention on social media. Gus Walz was emotional during his father's nomination.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Seven suns in sky? Viral video shows stunning optical illusion in China
item.description: In Chengdu, China, stargazers were taken by surprise when a video appeared to show seven suns in the sky. Filmed by a hospital visitor, the scene was an optical illusion caused by light refracting through the hospital’s layered glass windows. Social media users humorously speculated about global warming and cosmic myths, engaging viewers worldwide.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Kamala Harris' nieces teach how to pronounce their aunt's name at DNC: Watch video
item.description: During the Democratic National Convention, Kerry Washington, along with Kamala Harris' grand-nieces, Amara and Leela Ajagu, addressed the correct pronunciation of Harris' name. The playful segment was an effort to eliminate confusion and ensure respect for Harris, with the young girls demonstrating the pronunciation through a memorable chant that engaged the audience.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Pelosi’s DNC stage drop sparks online frenzy: Was that toilet paper or something else? Mystery finally solved
item.description: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi unintentionally dropped a white paper-like item from her pants during the Democratic National Convention, causing a social media frenzy. Initially speculated to be toilet paper, it was eventually disclosed to be folded note cards for her speech. The viral incident added a memorable moment to the event.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Vivek Ramaswamy slams Kamala Harris as ‘puppet’ and ‘failed leader’ amidst DNC: ‘Her open border policy offends every legal immigrant’
item.description: Republican leader Vivek Ramaswamy criticized Vice President Kamala Harris during the Democratic National Convention, calling her a 'puppet.' He accused her of avoiding policy discussions to maintain her popularity, targeted her economic and border policies, and emphasized his support for Donald Trump, aiming to position him as the preferable candidate for the upcoming election.

item.title: Kamala Harris' big speech seeks to redefine her for America
Trump’s absence, present impact at DNC: How former US president's influence shapes the convention
item.description: Donald Trump's impact is evident at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago despite his absence. Though aides claim he isn't watching, he is reportedly annoyed by attacks against him. Trump’s campaign is caught between highlighting policies and responding to personal jabs, making it difficult to maintain a consistent focus on policy.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Baby among at least 10 people who drowned after migrant boat overturned on Serbia-Bosnia border
item.description: A tragic incident occurred on the Drina River between Serbia and Bosnia, where at least 10 migrants drowned after their boat capsized. Serbian officials reported 25 people were on board; 18 made it to shore, including 16 Syrians and two Egyptians. Rescue operations are underway to find more survivors and victims.

item.title: Would RFK Jr dropping out of the race benefit Trump? Latest poll reveals key insights
item.description: Republicans show more support for independent candidate Robert F Kennedy Jr than Democrats, as polls indicate. Trump allies are urging Kennedy to endorse Trump amid his declining support, further affected by Biden's exit and Harris' nomination. His diminishing momentum is also impacted by legal challenges and divided independent voter views.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: US elections 2024: In Kamala Harris’ story, her mother steals the show - 'Star of my life'
item.description: Kamala Harris reflects on the profound influence of her mother, Shyamala Gopalan, a pioneering breast cancer researcher. Gopalan’s determination and unwavering support significantly shaped Harris' career. Her legacy of resilience and public service continues to inspire Harris as she navigates her political journey, emphasizing the importance of self-determination and mentoring others.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: DNC Day 4: Complete schedule and IST timings
item.description: The final day of the 2024 Democratic National Convention in Chicago highlights Vice President Kamala Harris accepting her party's nomination. Themed “For Our Future,” the event includes various important speeches, celebrity appearances, and performances. The Democratic Party aims to present a cohesive front, energizing supporters, and preparing for the upcoming 2024 elections.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Gus Walz’s emotional support for his dad Tim at DNC captured hearts. But then the bullies came
item.description: During the Democratic National Convention, Minnesota Governor Tim Walz and his son Gus shared an emotional moment, later marred by online bullying. Gus, who has a nonverbal learning disorder, faced cruel comments primarily from Trump supporters, raising concerns among disability advocates.
